task: How to Use Veet on Your Bikini Area
step: Lay out a towel for you to sit on while you wax.
Sit in a comfortable position with your legs spread open.
Rub a Veet wax strip between your hands to warm it up.
Peel the strips apart and set them on the towel wax-side up.
Apply 1 of the strips to your skin.
Rub the strip 3-4 times in the direction of your hair growth.
Hold your skin taut so that it’s easy to pull off the strip.
Grasp the end of the wax strip and rip it off.
Continue applying wax strips until your entire bikini area is hair-free.
Wipe off the excess wax using the cloths provided in the box.

task: How to Remove Hair Using Organic Ganda Beroza
step: Exfoliate your skin before removing hair.
Wash your hands with soap and water.
Take a small amount of solid ganda beroza.
Take a pinch of the hair removal agent.
Apply the pinch of ganda beroza to your body hair.
Hold the unwanted hair between your thumb and index finger where you have already applied the ganda beroza.
Keep repeating the procedure until all unwanted hairs are removed.
Clean the skin gently.
Remove ganda beroza from you fingers.
Wash your hands with soap and water.

task: How to Shave Your Legs Out of Water
step: Spray your legs with water or use a wet towel to wet your legs.
Add some stick deodorant, (NOT antiperspirant!).
Squirt just a little bit of water on top of your gel/foamburst/deodrant.
Now shave your legs as you normally do if you were in a shower.
Use a dry cloth or towel to dry your legs and get any hair off.
Once your finished use a after-shaving lotion or a body lotion to make your legs even smoother and moisturizer.

task: How to Remove Wax from Wool

Run an iron over the bag on medium heat.
Remove the paper bag.
Repeat with clean paper bags until the wax is removed.
